creator: reeder.29@osu.edu
text:
#  Build Slide using :

        cd $JAKARTA_HOME/jakarta-slide
        $ANT_HOME/bin/ant.sh    for Unix
        %ANT_HOME%\bin\ant      for Windows
      
.
.
.
      

# A web application which can be used in any Servlet 2.3 compliant container can
be found $JAKARTA_HOME/jakarta-slide/dist/webapp/slide.war.


A target such as webapp-dist must be specified to create the war file
